pr_title: DB-9386 Increase heap size for standalone

timeline.message:
DB-9386 Disable MSLAB for ITs

Make sure we create ZK structure before trying to access it

DB-9386 Increase heap size for standalone

Reenable MSLAB on standalone

timeline.bodyText: What's the point of this file? It seems fully commented out.
timeline.author: arnaud-splice
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,44 @@
+# Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one

replies.bodyText: This file overrides the default that has some of those lines uncommented. We could certainly have an empty file, I just left the original for reference/example if we ever need to enable some of them.
replies.author: dgomezferro
